Test Summary: Test Case 1: CBDC Purchase of Goods at Merchant with Offline Capability - Sufficient Funds
Test Data: cbdc_wallet_id: user12345, merchant_id: merchant67890, transaction_amount: 50.0, offline_capability: True, cbdc_balance: 100.0, network_connectivity: False
Expected Result: transaction_status: success, user_cbdc_balance: 50.0, merchant_cbdc_balance: 50.0, transaction_id: generated_unique_id, transaction_timestamp: current_timestamp, offline_confirmation_mechanism: secure_hash_algorithm

Test Summary: Test Case 2: CBDC Peer-to-Peer Transfer - Insufficient Funds
Test Data: sender_wallet_id: userABCDE, recipient_wallet_id: userFGHIJ, transfer_amount: 200.0, sender_cbdc_balance: 50.0, transaction_type: peer-to-peer
Expected Result: transaction_status: failed, error_code: INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, error_message: Sender does not have sufficient funds to complete the transaction., user_cbdc_balance: 50.0, recipient_cbdc_balance: unchanged_recipient_balance

Test Summary: Test Case 3: CBDC Redemption to Commercial Bank Account
Test Data: cbdc_wallet_id: userKLMNO, bank_account_number: 1234567890, redemption_amount: 75.0, cbdc_balance: 150.0, bank_id: bankUSA123
Expected Result: transaction_status: success, cbdc_balance: 75.0, bank_account_balance: incremented_by_75, transaction_id: generated_unique_id, transaction_timestamp: current_timestamp, redemption_fee: 0.0

Test Summary: Test Case 4: CBDC Transaction Exceeding Daily Limit
Test Data: cbdc_wallet_id: userPQRST, transaction_amount: 1500.0, daily_transaction_limit: 1000.0, cbdc_balance: 2000.0, time_of_transaction: current_timestamp, transaction_type: merchant_payment
Expected Result: transaction_status: failed, error_code: DAILY_LIMIT_EXCEEDED, error_message: Transaction amount exceeds the daily transaction limit., cbdc_balance: 2000.0, transaction_id: None

Test Summary: Test Case 5: CBDC Wallet Creation and Initial Funding
Test Data: user_id: userUVWXY, bank_account_number: 0987654321, initial_funding_amount: 250.0, bank_id: bankCAN456
Expected Result: wallet_creation_status: success, cbdc_wallet_id: generated_unique_wallet_id, cbdc_balance: 250.0, transaction_id: generated_unique_id, transaction_timestamp: current_timestamp, audit_trail: log_of_wallet_creation_and_initial_funding
